about_the_game:
3D platformer puzzle game with light horror elements, lonely and surreal atmosphere.

Embark on a journey through cold concrete labyrinths in a quest for knowledge about the world.

You can't jump, you can't climb, but you have one useful trick up your sleeve: pull blocks around and build your own path around obstacles. Almost any wall can be moved around, freeing a passage or becoming a make-shift elevator.

Any situation you're in has multiple solutions, try to reduce your completion time and shifts count for extra rewards. Collect all the gems and conquer this world.
Some levels have extra gems and extra puzzles to get them: you'll have to figure out how to change your play style.

FEATURES:
  • 24 levels
  • Multiple optional goals
  • Extra abstract puzzles, challenging not only your block-shifting skills, but ability to figure out a particular level's goal
  • Stylized PSX-esque art style
  • Lonely and unsettling atmosphere
